main event: Witnesses observed a very bright elongated object moving rapidly northward in South Berwick, Maine for about 10-15 minutes during dusk.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 13/03/1969., The object was described as elongated and approximately 50-60 feet long., Multiple witnesses reported seeing the object initially as a big flash before it moved away., The object was reported to have red and green lights that disappeared rapidly., There was no electromagnetic interference or physiological effects reported.
witness description: The witness reported seeing 4-5 objects with red and green lights that seemed to hover and then disappeared.
